Name: Paralax Vr Aim Trainer
About the game: Paralax Vr Aim Trainer is a program designed to help you achieve the best performance in a wide variety of VR games though structured scenarios focusing of the core aspects of aim development (Aiming, Flicking, Tracking and Reaction time) with data to track and support progression. We focus on developing all the features you need without the unnecessary extras that you would be stuck paying for. • Traced and Un-traced Bullet Types (for better aim practice) • Accuracy, hit ratio, reaction time statistics and other skill development data • Progress Tracking Mechanisms so you can visualize your improvement • 33 of Scenarios To improve whatever aspect of gun play u need • An ever expanding library of weapon types to suit Ur needs
